conversations.content: Can you pull up my English teaching language exchange workspace?

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731059000000_e5n7g9l1i", "workspaceId": "ws_1731059000000_e1n2g3l4t", "sessionDescription": "Teaching English via language exchange platform - 8 regular students learning conversational English while practicing my Japanese", "sessionMemory": "Month 6 of teaching. 8 students: 5 Japanese (intermediate), 2 Korean (beginner), 1 Chinese (advanced). Sessions 3x/week (1 hr each). Lesson topics: business English, travel phrases, idioms. Creating custom materials. Students' progress: strong improvement in fluency, pronunciation still needs work. Exchange: practicing Japanese with Yuki (N3 level study partner).", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to prepare this week's idiom lesson and review student progress notes", "primaryGoal": "Help 8 students achieve conversational fluency while reaching Japanese N2 proficiency through exchange", "subgoal": "Complete idiom lesson series, prepare 2 students for business English interviews"}, "id": "ws_1731059000000_e1n2g3l4t"}
Run MoodDJ over Playlist Ideas and append three chillwave directions to Music/Ideas/Playlist Seeds.md.

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731059680456_b8m2r1p6k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731059640000_playlst5z", "sessionDescription": "Seed chillwave playlist", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Run MoodDJ agent", "primaryGoal": "Generate playlist motifs", "subgoal": "Append seeds"}, "agent": "MoodDJ", "filepaths": ["Music/Ideas/Playlist Ideas.md"], "prompt": "Give me three chillwave palette ideas with sensory details.", "provider": "openai", "model": "gpt-4o-mini", "temperature": 0.35, "action": {"type": "append", "targetPath": "Music/Ideas/Playlist Seeds.md"}}
I want a custom agent that helps with API design. Make it focus on REST best practices.

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731018900000_t1u2v3w4x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731018900000_y5z6a7b8c", "sessionDescription": "Creating API design agent", "sessionMemory": "User establishing API development standards", "toolContext": "Setting up REST API expert assistant", "primaryGoal": "Create API design agent", "subgoal": "Configure REST best practices agent"}, "name": "REST API Designer", "description": "Provides expert guidance on RESTful API design and best practices", "prompt": "You are a REST API design expert. When helping with API design: 1) Ensure proper use of HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE), 2) Design intuitive, resource-based URL structures, 3) Recommend appropriate status codes for different scenarios, 4) Guide on request/response payload structure, 5) Advise on versioning strategies, 6) Suggest pagination, filtering, and sorting approaches, 7) Emphasize security best practices (authentication, rate limiting), 8) Promote idempotency and statelessness. Provide concrete examples and explain the reasoning.", "isEnabled": true}
